title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and push models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as LLM, Chat and Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with model management, chat, generate, embeddings and async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn VS Code into a local AI copilot by pointing GitHub Copilot plugin to Ollama endpoint.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local LLM conversations to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for reproducible Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that exposes Ollama models via slash commands and app mentions.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up ephemeral Ollama services for testing.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Lightweight C++ client library (header-only) for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instance with session memory.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapper that adds authentication, rate-limiting and OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you summarize, translate or brainstorm inside your knowledge base using Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama API.
